Pgmoil User Manual(0)                     Pgmoil User Manual(0)





NAME
       pgmoil - replaced by pamoil

DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       pgmoil  was  replaced  in  Netpbm  9.16  (July  2001) by
       pamoil(1).

       pamoil is backward compatible with pgmoil, but works  on
       color images too.



netpbm documentation       July 2001      Pgmoil User Manual(0)
